DOC.brief_title: Long Term Study To Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Efficacy Fesoterodine Overactive Bladder .
DOC.criteria: Adult OAB patient present OAB symptom , include micturition > = 8 per day urinary urgency episode > =1 per day . Patient known hypersensitivity active substance ( fesoterodine fumarate ) peanut soya excipients . Patient known neurological disease influence bladder function . Patient complication lower urinary tract pathology potentially responsible urgency incontinence , clinically relevant bladder outlet obstruction pelvic organ prolapse .
